playground:basketswing.description: describe if the facility have a basketswing

playground:chain_ladder.description: describe if the facility have a chain ladder

playground:slide.description: describe if the facility have a slide

playground:swing.description: describe if the facility have a swing

playground:aerialrotator.description: describe if the facility have an aerialrotator

playground:basketball_backboard.description: describe if a zone where play basketball is available

playground:exercise.description: describe if an equipment are for the exercise is present

playground:horizontal_bar.description: describe if an horizontal bar is present

playground:seesaw.description: describe if an seesaw is present

playground:tunnel_tube.description: describe if an tunnel tube is present

playground:climbingframe.description: describe if a climbing frame is present

playground:multi_play.description: describe if a multiple usage surface is available

playground:sandpit.description: describe if a sandpit is present

playground:skate_equipment.description: describe if the park is equipment to play with the skateboard

playground:teenshelter.description: describe if a teen shelter is available

city.description: the city component of the address

housenumber.description: the house number component of the address

postal_code.description: the postcode component of the address

StreetName.description: the street component of the address

latitude.description: latitude coordinate of the location in EPSG 4326 projection standard

longitude.description: longitude coordinate of the location in EPSG 4326 projection standard
